text: Why Trump might regret passing on the first debate  —  In recent nominating contests, the nationally televised shoutfests have prompted significant shifts in polling afterward.  —  Donald Trump wants to deprive his competitors of any oxygen.  That's why the former president is likely skipping next week's debate in Milwaukee.
